SEARCH
Package com.example.lotteryevent.repository

Interface IEventDetailsRepository

All Known Implementing Classes:
EventDetailsRepositoryImpl, FakeEventDetailsRepository
public interface IEventDetailsRepository
Interface for the repository that handles data for the Event Details screen. This contract defines all the necessary operations for fetching details of a single event and managing the current user's interaction with it (e.g., joining, leaving, accepting).

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    void
    fetchEventAndEntrantDetails(String eventId)
    Kicks off the process of fetching both the event's main details and the current user's entrant status from the data source.
    androidx.lifecycle.LiveData<Integer>
    getAttendeeCount()
    Exposes the current count of attendees (status = "accepted") for the event.
    androidx.lifecycle.LiveData<Entrant>
    getEntrantStatus()
    Exposes the current user's entrant status for this event as LiveData.
    androidx.lifecycle.LiveData<Event>
    getEventDetails()
    Exposes the details of the currently loaded event as LiveData.
    androidx.lifecycle.LiveData<String>
    getMessage()
    Exposes user-facing messages, such as success confirmations or errors, as LiveData.
    androidx.lifecycle.LiveData<Integer>
    getWaitingListCount()
    Exposes the current count of entrants on the waiting list (status = "waiting").

    Exposes the current loading state as a boolean LiveData.

    Adds the current user to the event's waiting list.

    leaveWaitingList(String eventId)

    Updates the current user's invitation status (e.g., to "accepted" or "declined").

  • Method Details

    • getEventDetails

      androidx.lifecycle.LiveData<Event> getEventDetails()
      Exposes the details of the currently loaded event as LiveData. The value will be an Event object on success, or null otherwise.

    • getEntrantStatus

      androidx.lifecycle.LiveData<Entrant> getEntrantStatus()
      Exposes the current user's entrant status for this event as LiveData. The value will be an Entrant object if the user is involved with the event, or null if they are not logged in or not an entrant.

    • isLoading

      androidx.lifecycle.LiveData<Boolean> isLoading()
      Exposes the current loading state as a boolean LiveData. True if any operation is in progress, false otherwise.

    • getMessage

      androidx.lifecycle.LiveData<String> getMessage()
      Exposes user-facing messages, such as success confirmations or errors, as LiveData.

    • fetchEventAndEntrantDetails

      void fetchEventAndEntrantDetails(String eventId)
      Kicks off the process of fetching both the event's main details and the current user's entrant status from the data source.
      Parameters:
      eventId - The unique identifier of the event to load.

    • joinWaitingList

      void joinWaitingList(String eventId)
      Adds the current user to the event's waiting list. The result of this operation will be reflected in the getMessage() LiveData.
      Parameters:
      eventId - The ID of the event to join.

    • leaveWaitingList

      void leaveWaitingList(String eventId)
      Removes the current user from the event's waiting list.
      Parameters:
      eventId - The ID of the event to leave.

    • updateInvitationStatus

      void updateInvitationStatus(String eventId, String newStatus)
      Updates the current user's invitation status (e.g., to "accepted" or "declined").
      Parameters:
      eventId - The ID of the event.
      newStatus - The new status string to set.

    • getAttendeeCount

      androidx.lifecycle.LiveData<Integer> getAttendeeCount()
      Exposes the current count of attendees (status = "accepted") for the event.

    • getWaitingListCount

      androidx.lifecycle.LiveData<Integer> getWaitingListCount()
      Exposes the current count of entrants on the waiting list (status = "waiting").
